text: Classical dancers pay tribute to the Lord of Dance, Nataraja, at the ancient Nataraja cave at Mogulrajpuram in Vijayawada on Wednesday. Thanks to the performance of Raisa Luther (Bharatanatyam), Hima Bindu Kanaj, Sindhuja (Kuchipudi), Mythili Anoop (Mohiniyattam) and Mitha Vinay (Kathak) the lifeless precincts of the cave came alive.— PHOTO: V. RAJU
title: Tribute to heritage
